text: The Federația Română de Fotbal (Romanian Football Federation), also known by its acronym FRF, is the governing body of football in Romania. They are headquartered in the capital city of Bucharest and affiliated to FIFA and UEFA since 1923 and 1955 respectively. The Federation organizes the national team and the women's national team, as well as most of the Romanian football competitions. ==Presidents== {|class="wikitable" |-class="hintergrundfarbe" !President !Period |- |Collective Management | October 1909 – 1 December 1912 |- |Hans Herzog | 1912 – 1 December 1912 |- |Charles Viereck | 1 December 1912 – 1 December 1913 |- |T.
